title: How can I help the project?

share.title: Share with the world
share.description: Do you like Rigami? Tell the world about this project, let as many people as possible learn about it

form.title: Tell us about your experience
form.description: Your feedback is very useful for the development of the project, tell us what problems you faced and what you would like to see

donate.title: Buy me coffee
donate.description: You can donate a small amount for development, I will be pleased

offerToInstall: Or just install Rigami and enjoy
